big city orchestra / ubuibi.title: welikenoise too
big city orchestra / ubuibi.about:
We Like Noize was performed live on UB radio on KZSC. All fifty records used were spraypainted black and etched. During the performance, more manipulation occurred, every record was played by all fours artists. No other sound material was used. 



Hand numbered Edition of fifty, each in a bag containing the cassette and ground up records used in an Haters performance.
big city orchestra / ubuibi.credits:
released September 9, 1990
            
            Cliff Neighbors, Das, Elden M., Rob Wortman

big city orchestra / ubuibi.title: fan clUB tape #5
big city orchestra / ubuibi.about: some of us are of the opinion that the 2 sides are concrete pieces & should be left that way.....others believe that everything should be re-edited & turned into easy tracks......this is a bit of both, selecting the stand alone bits and leaving the rest the strange morass that cassettes provoke.
